name: Tutorial: Zelda Clone
description:
My name is Bryant Jackson and I am a game developer currently working on a series of tutorials to teach young and aspiring game developers to create and release their first game. The game they create throughout this series is a clone of the vastly popular GBC games: Zelda Oracle of Ages/Seasons.

For more information or to contribute to the acquisition of distributable art assets, please visit my Patreon or Twitter pages.

The actual tutorials can be found on my website:

http://www.bryantmakesprograms.com/tutorial
